sentences.sContent: It is understandable that parents are angry, and looking for someone to blame.
sentences.sCn: 父母生气了想找个人出气，这是可以理解的。

sentences.sContent: He just can’t face anyone at the moment, which is perfectly understandable.
sentences.sCn: 他现在就是无法面对任何人，这完全可以理解。

synos.tran: 可以理解的；可以了解的

words.tran: 了解的；聪明的；有理解力的
被充分理解的；心照不宣的
明白；懂得（understand的过去分词）；熟悉

trans.tranCn: 可以理解的；可以了解的
trans.tranOther: understandable behaviour, reactions etc seem normal and reasonable because of the situation you are in
